main.name: Mingxing Wang
main.occupation: Full Stack Web Developer and a machine learning engineer
main.description: Proactive and passionate full stack web developer with over 10 years of experience. Eager to learn new technology and love to conquer new challenge
main.bio: Majored computer science and mathematics at university. Worked in Big 3 companies(Dalian ship building industry, CuddlyNest, Bitwage) as a full stack web developer. Mastered several algorithms and code challenge.

education.description: Majored at mathematics and information technology. I got bachelor's degree by presenting paper in limitness of new hidden Markov Chain. Mastered several mathematical fields and computer science.

testimonials.text: I was very happy while working with Mingxing. He is a kind, punctual and passionate guy. I love to work with him in the future
Mingxing, very team spirit. He works well with team with communication skills and clear understanding and instruction.
